title: Purposeful Visualization
text: Think about the story you're trying to tell with your data, and match your visuals to it.

title: Visual Selection Strategy
text: Choosing visuals that align with your goals and your data's complexity is best, regardless of specific audience knowledge.

title: Software Assistance
text: Decisions about what is best interpreted by an audience should be made by the presenter who has the most knowledge about their data.

title: Standard Charts
text: Based on the data and the story, the three most common and standard charts might not be the best fit.
